column5: Happy birthday Roy, have a great trip, gets lotsa specs.
Happy birthday Monsieur, you and J have a great trip.
Copy right infringment.LOL

Happy Birthday Roy, now you treat yourself to a good Greek meal that Mtl is Famous for.  If not at least a greasy Vincents or Belle province Submarine that  I dearly miss, oh yea I forgot also a Molson Ex
Knowing Roy the way I do it can be the other way around as long as he has plenty of both!  All the very best to you my friend!
Happy Birthday my friend Hope you have a super day!!! Jacques
Happy Birthday ya ol french hoser!!
Happy Birthday Roy
Happy Birthday and best wishes ROY. Dan
Happy Birthday Roy.  Jim
Hope you have a super, spectacular day Hon!!!  Go get the biggest spec there is in that lake my dear, and relax for a few days.  Joey
Hope that you have a terrific day Roy. Happy Birthday my friend!
All the best Roy...like Joey sez...go get a big one...
Happy Birthday Roy hope you have a great day  Rob
Best Fishes to the Old Fart Roy!!!

As per our previous conversation, I couldn't let you drop the "abs" comment unnoticed:   Roy, I've gotten uglier, thus the face blur. and HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  (Now your age and height are the same????)   HAPPY B-DAY BUDDY!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Hope you're havin FUN Roy and that the Specks are jumping on J's line... I mean your line!
Happy Bday bud.  go get 'em
Happy birthday Roy.  I hope you can celebrate by taking two.
Happy birthday!
Happy B-Day!
ANOTHER ONE I thought you quit counting them a while back.  Anyway, hope ya have a great day and a whole lot more yet to come.
Have a good one bud! L.A

Thanks guys. What a great community this is. Spending a nice quiet day here slowly packing the Jeep and boat for a trip about 200 miles north of Lac St-Jean. J and I are going up, bringing the bimini and we'll do the "on Golden Pond" thing. It's a small lake with small specks. Probably none bigger than 12" but it'll be a nice relaxing time without electricity or phones. I'll try to get as many pics as I can but they won't be as good as Joey's.  Thank you all again.
Have a great day
Have a great day Roy!
Happy B day to you bud I am glad to see ya around for another year or two......    Art

Happy Birthday young fella  Wonderful  ... specks ... bimini .... northern (er I guess thats still considered southern) Quebec wilderness ...ahhhh ... my ZEC trip is still a month away ...dont forget the camera !
Jeez..200 miles north of Lac St.Jean, what you doing, going to visit Santa Claus?  Better stop and pick some bluets and crottes de fromage along the way.  Have a great day and a fantastic trip.
Have a blast my friend. Joe
Cant believe I misthis one.  May yer beer be cold and yer woman be hot for you on yer day my friend.   Happy BDAY to you. Roy.
Hey roy, hope you had a GREAT day!!!  Maureen
Happy Birthday Roy.  Hope you and J have a wonderful time
Happy birthday Roy! Catch a big one.
Happy birthday ROY!
